name: 第二語言習得研究
comment: 教室：綜合大樓10樓華語系教室
description: In contrast to first language acquisition, the end state of second language acquisition is unreliable and unconvergent. It usually relies on the interaction among first language, language universal/universal linguistic patterns, and domain-general learning properties. This course serves as an introduction to investigate each of these factors that affect second language acquisition.
goals: To be able to understand the basic principles and themes in second language acquisition.
be able to specify what factors affect language learning and acquisition
develop a research hypothesis on a particular effect of second language acquisition, comprehension and production
